channel.title: My shop will not open
channel.description:
Problem: I added a shop to my server. I tried to open the shop by clicking the shopkeeper, but the shop will not open.
Source: Project 16 v.3.0
Difficulty: 3/10

item.title: My shop will not open
item.dc:creator: @iceman21 iceman21
item.description:
@iceman21 wrote:

ok theres 2 things you should do make sure the npc is where other shop npcs are if that doesnt work make sure that the npc isnt the same as a other shop npc IF THAT DOESNT WORK then check the wanneshop numbers and the npc id make sure they are all the same NOW IF THAT DOESNT WORK then change the in client…(you said that when u click talk on it)…change it to where aubury rune shop is instead of under “first click NPC”

Read full topic

item.title: My shop will not open
item.dc:creator: @shadow235 shadow235
item.description:
@shadow235 wrote:

Does it kick you off?

Read full topic
